articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Signal gets new video call features, making it a viable alternative to Zoom, Meet and Teams - TechCrunch
articles.description: Privacy-focused messaging app Signal is adding new features for video calls, including links, reactions and a calls tab, in a bid to pose as an
articles.content:
Privacy-focused messaging app Signal is adding new features for video calls, including links, reactions and a calls tab, in a bid to pose as an alternative to Zoom, Google Meet and Microsoft Teams.
